display_long_description:
**Boring battles are banished!**

This is **Battlegrounds** - your free multiplayer sandbox where medieval chaos meets physics-fueled freedom. No rules. No limits. Just wild, player-driven fun... all in the name of the Kingdom.

Explore the world, pull off impossible stunts, or dive into the madness of medieval mayhem. Whether you’re messing around or rallying warriors, the kingdom thrives on your actions.

- **PvP Combat:** Engage in physics-powered battles. Fling enemies, strike from the skies, or outwit them up close.
- **Unreal Movement:** Grapple, jetpack, dash, and climb with unmatched agility. Master momentum for aerial chaos & mid-air flexes.
- **Unleash Chaos:** Crazy weapons, wild gadgets, bombs, cannons, and catapults - all at your disposal to cause max destruction.
- **Team Up or Go Rogue:** Fight with or against your friends. Choose your allegiance… and when to break it. In Battlegrounds, betrayal hits just as hard. Coz’ loyalty is optional but chaos isn’t.

# A true warrior doesn’t just fight, they flex!

- **Character builder:** Customize your look & your loadout.
- **Quests:** Take on challenges to stack gold.
- **Unlockables:** Spend gold on cosmetics & new gear.
- **Limited-time bundles:** Grab exclusive looks while you can!

# The Kingdom is expanding 
**Expect:** More maps. Bigger servers. Party system. Themed updates. 

# Join the Kingdom’s council - **discord.gg/bgvr**
Meet fellow warriors, get leaks, unlock challenges & giveaways!
